alert.note: Alert for Mountains Southwestern Shasta County to Western Colusa County; Northeast Foothills, Sacramento Valley; Northern Sacramento Valley; Shasta Lake Area, Northern Shasta County (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 05 at 7:05PM PST by NWS Sacramento
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of through 745 PM PST... ... ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT CENTRAL SHASTA COUNTY THROUGH 745 PM PST... At 703 PM PST, Doppler radar was tracking a cluster of strong thunderstorms near Mountain Gate, or 7 miles east of Shasta Dam, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor road flooding. Locations impacted include... Redding, Shasta Dam, Shasta Lake, Central Valley Cdp, Igo, Keswick, Central Valley, Whiskeytown, Mountain Gate, and Centerville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
